ygData.subject: Re: Boat Crashes
ygData.msgSnippet: Was that this week?  I ve been on the boat a couple times in the last week, since the last patch.  People still disappeared and it appeared as though I still
ygData.messageBody:
Was that this week? I've been on the boat a couple times in the last week,
since the last patch. People still disappeared and it appeared as though I
still wasn't able to /say anything that anyone could hear. But, my stam was
now left alone, and I felt less nervous on the trip.

> From: "Douglass Family" <frd@...>
>
> Its a serious problem, I got dropped into the ocean of tears... spent 1.5
> hours swimming, thank god for the jig, finally made it to the Isle of the
> Sisters ( i was dropped just entering OOT from Kaladim), Then for a kick
in
> the pants I caught the boat at the isle, and entered the freeport zone,
got
> disconned, and appeared as boat was leaving Freeport, had to jumpship and
> swim to the docks. My swimming is 91 now.
>
